channel.title: Delta quest choices
channel.description:
I've looked all around and still have this problem. [code]case 1101: choice("Have you any quests for me?", "Where can i find money?"); break;[/code]
I want to make it so if you click "Have you any quests for me?" that it goes to explaining the quests and w.e So I need to know how to figure out how to make it know if you have clicked one of the dialogues. Sorry if this is an easy question.

item.title: Delta quest choices
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

I’ve looked all around and still have this problem.

case 1101: choice("Have you any quests for me?", "Where can i find money?"); break;

I want to make it so if you click “Have you any quests for me?” that it goes to explaining the quests and w.e
So I need to know how to figure out how to make it know if you have clicked one of the dialogues.
Sorry if this is an easy question.

Read full topic
